content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">     <ShortName>Berkeley Lab Commons</ShortName>     <Description>Atlassian Confluence Search Provider</Description>     <Image height="16" width="16" type="image/x-icon">https://commons.lbl.gov/images/logo/confluence_48_white.png</Image>     <Image height="64" width="64" type="image/png">https://commons.lbl.gov/images/logo/confluence_128_white.png</Image>     <Url type="text/html" template="https://commons.lbl.gov/dosearchsite.action?queryString={searchTerms}"/>     <Query role="example" searchTerms="Confluence"/>     <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>     <moz:SearchForm>https://commons.lbl.gov/searchsite.action</moz:SearchForm> </OpenSearchDescription>
